page.title: 12Family Leisure Time - Derby
page.content: In my spare time I enjoy going horse-riding. I go to a riding centre every Sunday. I enjoy reading books about horse adventures and I like boarding school mysteries too.I also like watching television. I don't like westerns or the news, but I prefer comedies and most other programs. I go swimming , usually once a week, with my friend. In winter I like playing on my family's computer. I like playing board games and drawing. Also in winter I watch more television. My dad enjoys watching nature and sport programmes on the television.He also enjoys drinking at the Royal British Legion. My mum enjoys knitting and watching films on television.
